caption.p: Supplementary Materials are about “Sample Analysis and Verification by HPLC”. Figure 1: HPLC chromatograms of medicinal material extract (A) and mixed reference solution (B). Table 1: regression data for three bioactive compounds obtained by HPLC results. Table 2: the precision, repeatability, and stability of three flavonoids. Table 3: the recovery of three flavonoids. Table 4: comparison of H-qNMR and HPLC.
